synopsis.text: And so, the season of blossoming love arrives, and for Junichi Hashiba, a high school student, the pressure is on. Desperate to break free from his self-imposed shackles of inexperience, he finds himself coerced by his mischievous friends into confessing his feelings to Yukana Yame, a fashion-forward and charismatic gal. Much to his astonishment, Yukana accepts his confession, setting the stage for a series of unpredictable firsts. As Junichi navigates through this whirlwind of new experiences, he must learn to tame his raging hormones and build his self-confidence in this unforeseen school life brimming with vivacious girls and unexpected chaos. Little does he know, the real challenge has just begun.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
